text: Mehul Nisar is an Indian television and film actor. He started his career with the 1998 television series Hip Hip Hurray. He has acted in more than 25 television shows and has appeared in more than 100 television commercials. ==Career== Mehul Nisar started his career with the TV series Hip Hip Hurray in 1998, and has acted in many more television shows since then. He has had a long association with Rajshri Films, working with them on Pyar Ke Do Naam... Ek Radha ek Shyam, Woh Rehne Wali Mehalo Ki and Yahan Main Ghar Ghar Kheli.
